Our team at Bosch is actively recruiting for multiple positions (Associate Software Engineer(less than 9 months), Software Engineer,  Senior Software Engineer, Scrum Master, Project Managers and more) for various locations within their India offices (as well as fully Remote WFH).

If you're interested or know of someone who's looking for their 1st Job or a Role Switch, please inform in the Comments below and feel free to reach out for a Referral.

posts.userHeadline: Engineering Manager at Tower Research | RA at Georgia Tech
posts.postContent:
Hiring an SDE2 for my team at Tower Research Capital in India! We're a growing team of developers and we'd love to have you - grow and learn together! The role is focused on Python, Java, and analytics. If you're interested in working with us, fill this form: https://lnkd.in/de5ZEh7t

Some info:

1. Full time role based in Gurgaon (Delhi NCR), India
2. Prior work experience is required (no openings for freshers or interns at the moment for this team)
3. The work is primarily focused on development, scripting and analytics (stack: Java, Python, relation & non relations databases, web services, analytics & visualization tools)
4. Prior work experience with Kibana/Tableau is a plus —- indicate this if you have it
5. Prior work experience with financial technologies, post trade functions, compliance and regulatory reporting is a plus —- indicate this if you have it
6. Benefits include standard Tower benefits: cab facility, all meals provided, 5 weeks of paid vacation, health club allowance, etc.

PS: The goal is to mutually learn. I am a new manager as well, and I’m looking to learn from you too!

#hiring #java #python
  

…see more

We are hiring interns for our advanced AI team for CNN, Reinforcement learning and computer vision in India office. 

Please send resumes to (hidden) 

It is a highly selective role, and the intern must have maths, computer sciences and python skills. Maths proficiency to solve complex problems is must.

#browserstack  is hiring for Software Engineers yet again. 

Desired Experience :
1. Software development or programming experience of 6 months - 2 years
2. Extensive experience with at least one language: Ruby, Nodejs, Python, Java, C/C++.
3. Good knowledge of operating systems, databases and networking concepts
4. Ability to work on Windows and Linux platforms below the application layer, including file systems, kernels, custom installations, scripting, internal APIs, etc
5. Ability to communicate effectively with employees in the company in both technical and non-technical roles
6. Aggressive problem diagnosis and solving real-world problems effectively.
7. Should have a startup mentality, high willingness to learn, and hardworking and be able to work in a fast-paced environment.

What you will do :
1. You will design and develop systems and applications, with agility and quality at scale.
2. You will take responsibility for end-to-end ownership of tasks from development to production.
3. Also will help with the design, implementation, and launch of many key product features. 
4. Participate in a culture of code reviews and collaborating closely with other engineers
5. Drive best practices and engineering improvements
6. Find solutions and solve issues around a variety of operating systems or programming languages

NOTE : No freshers and 2022 graduates please. 

Interested candidates kindly drop CV at (hidden) 

#softwareengineer #hiringsoftwareengineers #techhiring #backenddevelopers

posts.postContent:
Update: Please apply to one of the 4 mentioned positions following the respective code in mail subject: 
MSR Application 2022 | <JOBCODE>

We, at Microsoft Research Lab India, are actively hiring research interns (full-time, 3-6 months) and research fellows (full-time, 1 year) for optimization, applied ML/CV/RL, end to end system design and embedded systems related research projects. You are expected to have strong algorithmic/implementation skills and/or research background in the above-mentioned fields. A brief description of the skills required is shared below. Please consider applying by mailing me (millendroy239@gmail.com) your resume, I'll forward to the hiring team.

Positions: JOBCODE
 
Research Fellow (1 year): RFSYS  
o   RL, DL, applied ML and CV knowledge
o   Basic systems/end to end design knowledge

Research Intern (3-6 months): RISYS
o   RL, DL, applied ML and CV knowledge
o   Basic systems/end to end design knowledge

Research Intern (3-6 months): RISML
o   Sustainability knowledge with respect to carbon emissions in smart grids
o   Applied ML and CV knowledge

Research Intern (3-6 months):  RIEMB
o   Embedded C development
o   ESP32, ESP8266 experience

Please share in your network and feel free to reach out to me directly or other members in the team: Akshay Nambi, Tanuja Ganu, Anupam Sobti, Harsh Vijay, Vaibhav Balloli, Apoorva Agrawal, Tanmaey Gupta, Shubhankar Handa.

#research #systemdesign #datascience #machinelearning #appliedai #python #hiringinterns #msrindia #microsoft #energy #microsofthiring #optimization #reinforcementlearning #embeddedsystems #smartgrids #smartbuildings #sustainabilty #sustainableinnovation

posts.userHeadline: Building founding team | Harvard MBA, IIT KGP
posts.postContent:
Launching our internship program for software engineers! 

We are looking to hire software engineers with major or minor in Computer Science as interns at Metaphi. You will work directly with our founding team, and get to solve some of the most challenging problems at the intersection of cryptography and gaming. 

Prior experience in cryptography is not mandatory. We are looking for first principle thinkers, who are eager to hustle and learn. Trust me, this will be among the coolest and rewarding projects you would have worked on! 

Best part? You will have the opportunity to convert to full time founding engineers. Write code, and play games - that will be your day job! 

Start date: before 18 July 
Location: remote 
Duration: 2-3 months at least 

How to apply? Send in your resume to (hidden) and (hidden) 

cc: Nikhil Sarda Akshata Mohanty

#cryptography #hiring #internship #engineer #earlystagestartups #web3 #web3jobs

posts.userHeadline: Hiring talents for BrowserStack!
posts.postContent:
BrowserStack is expanding its Engineering teams and we are hiring for the below roles -

 1. Software Engineer - 
- 6 months - 2 years of relevant experience.
- Good experience in at least one scripting language: Ruby, Nodejs, Python, AppleScript, Unix shell or similar.
- Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem solving skills.
- Reasonable knowledge of Windows and/or Linux operating systems.

 2. Senior Software Engineer - 
- 3-6 years of relevant experience.
- Good experience in at least one scripting language: Ruby, Nodejs, Python, AppleScript, Unix shell or similar.
- Familiarity with one compiled language: C, Java, Go or similar.
- Good knowledge of operating systems and networking concepts.

If you fit into the above requirements please share your updated resume at srishti.p@browserstack.com.

posts.userHeadline: Building Swiggy!! We are Hiring !! Ex- ClearTax
posts.postContent:
We are looking for Engineering Manager - (Backend ) for Location Intelligence team at Swiggy.

Ideal profile :
● 7-9 years of experience in developing products with at least 1 year in leading a team
● In this role, you will be responsible for leading a team of front-end and back-end engineers to drive innovation in full-stack product development, while    relentlessly improving performance, scalability, and maintainability.
● Technically Hands-on, Prior experience with scalable Architecture managing team of (5-8)
● Coaching, mentoring engineers at various stages of their career. Good team management skills with ability to multitask, strong problem solving and analytical skills
● Experience working with Product Managers and UX Designers
● Experience with web technologies, Golang/Java, grpc, Apache Kafka, Redis, RDBMS, NoSQL databases, Docker, distributed caches, Apache Spark, etc.
● Experience with high performance websites catering to millions of daily traffic is a plus with an ability to bring in software engineering life cycle best practices
● Experience in the geospatial/location intelligence domain and relevant open source technologies is a plus


Please apply/reach out, if interested.

Tejeshwar Singh Pradnya Karbhari

#engineering #development #java #management #mentoring #softwaredevelopment

posts.userHeadline: Senior UX Engineer | Google
posts.postContent:
My team at Google is hiring for multiple positions for UI/UX engineers in India.  As a horizontal team that works on Consumer portfolio of Google products you would find yourself working in products like Google Search, Google Flights, Hotels, gPay and commerce products in this role. 

Our team's focus is frontend development, accessibility of our products (think dark mode, keyboard usability, screen reader navigation etc), prototyping new UI/UX solutions for next generation of product and ideas.

What are we looking for:  Folks with solid knowledge of native JS, understanding of HTML semantics, CSS, layout, animations, browser apis, DOM manipulation, performance considerations and a mindset to put users first.  Knowledge of React, Flutter, native app development is a plus but not mandatory.

So if you think you have a pretty solid grip on frontend basics (not React, jQuery, Angular etc), please fill in the form below.  Will add it in comments too.

https://lnkd.in/dvCZKT5P

#google #hiring #frontend #ux #css #team #js #ui #react #flutter #india

posts.userHeadline: Full-time Software R&D at SRIB | 2-mo & 6-mo Software R&D Intern at SRIB | CSE Student at NIT Silchar | 1700+ rating at CF and CC
posts.postContent:
Samsung Research Institute Bangalore is Hiring (Batch 2022 only)


A. Job Description: 

Designation: Developer 
Requirements – 
- Ability to solve problems using appropriate Algorithms and Data structures 
- Ability to write clean executable code – strong programming skills 
- Strong fundamentals in Computer Science 
- Strong analytical skills 
- Strong desire to 'Inspire the World and Create’ 
The selected candidate(s) would be primarily working on Software R&D projects and they will be further mapped to any of the below mentioned CoEs based on your interest and business requirements. 
•Intelligence (Voice, Vision, OnDevice, Data) 
•Multimedia (Camera, AR) 
•IoT (Cloud, IoTvity) 
•Modem (5G, Network) 
•Services (Server Tech, Web) 
 

B. Eligibility :

•Must have graduated in 2022 only
•B.E. / B.Tech, M.E / M.Tech, MCA, M.Sc
•CGPA – 7 and above
•Branches – CSE, ECE, EEE, IT, M&C
•Should not have interviewed with SRI-B in the last 6 months


C. CTC :  

- 14 LPA + 1L Sign on bonus + 5L Retention Bonus (Spread out across 4 years) .


D. Additional Benefits : 

Relocation Reimbursement, Initial 1 week of Company Sponsored Accommodation

Interested ones can DM me with their updated resumes.
Last Date to apply : 2nd July, Saturday 2022.

 #hiring #software #job #tech #batchof2022 #research #programming

Email Formate:<Profile><Position><Experience>:<Your Current Company>
Eg: Frontend : SDE-II : 4 : Zepto

Note:
If you already applied online in zepto either directly/indirectly in job portals then you are not eligible for referral.

posts.userHeadline: SWE @ Samsung Research
posts.postContent:
***Referral Alert***

Hi connections! Samsung Research Institute, Bangalore (Samsung R&D Institute India) is hiring for Software/R&D Developers (2022 Graduates only) across various teams through internal referrals:

🔹️Intelligence (Voice, Vision, OnDevice, Data)
🔹️Multimedia (Camera, AR)
🔹️IoT (Cloud, IoTvity)
🔹️Modem (5G, Network) 
🔹️Services (Server Tech, Web)

There are some eligibility criteria which must be met:

✅️Must have graduated in 2022 only
✅️B.E. / B.Tech, M.E / M.Tech, MCA, M.Sc
✅️CGPA – 7 and above
✅️Branches – CSE, ECE, EEE, IT, M&C

Also, the candidate should not have interviewed with SRI-B in the last 6 months.

Deadline to Apply: 3rd July (Saturday)

Request anyone looking for a referral to drop me a DM or send me an email at (hidden) with the Subject mentioned as "SRIB 2022 Referral" along with their updated resume.

#srib #samsung #referral #hiring #softwareengineer

posts.userHeadline: Software Engineer
posts.postContent:
Rippling is looking to build its Hub Platform team. The platform team builds both the product and technology foundations of Rippling. We’re responsible for the core service framework, permissioning, and other core technologies needed to write backend code at Rippling.

We’re also responsible for core product platforms like data reporting products, workflows, search, and RQL (Rippling Query Language), which are both external and internal facing. Projects like our workflow product allows company admins to define bespoke action and triggers to customize their Rippling ecosystem.

If you want to know more about the open roles, please see here: https://lnkd.in/eZtvgBbV
Open to talk and let you know more details 🙂

posts.userHeadline: Engineering Manager at Amazon
posts.postContent:
We have multiple SDE1/SDE2 positions in our team!

We are working in Compliance Domain in Amazon. We build solutions that help make products sold on Amazon safe for customers. 
We work to automate the classification, import/export eligibility, customs clearance, and adherence to target-country consumer-safety regulations at Amazon’s massive scale by building innovative solutions. 

Please DM me your Resume and preferred role if you are interested or if you want to know more details.

PS-People graduating in 2022 are not eligible for these positions.
